musicStruct.verse1:
[G]Amazing [C]grace how [G]sweet the [D]sound
That [G]saved a [C]wretch like [G]me
[G]I once was [C]lost but [G]now I'm [D]found
Was [G]blind but [C]now I [G]see
musicStruct.verse2:
[G]T'was grace that [C]taught my [G]heart to [D]fear
And [G]grace my [C]fears re[G]lieved
[G]How precious [C]did that [G]grace ap[D]pear
The [G]hour I [C]first be[G]lieved
musicStruct.chorus:
[Em]My chains are [D]gone, I've been set [G]free
[Em]My God, my [D]Savior has ransomed [G]me
[Em]And like a [D]flood His mercy [C]reigns
[G]Unending [D]love, amazing [G]grace

musicStruct.verse1:
There [Am]is a [C]house in [D]New Or[F]leans
They [Am]call the [C]Rising [E]Sun
And it's [Am]been the [C]ruin of [D]many a poor [F]boy
And [Am]God, I [E]know I'm [Am]one
musicStruct.verse2:
My [Am]mother [C]was a [D]tailor [F]
She [Am]sewed my [C]new blue [E]jeans
My [Am]father [C]was a [D]gambling [F]man
Down in [Am]New Or[E]leans [Am]
musicStruct.chorus:
Oh [Am]mother [C]tell your [D]children [F]
Not to [Am]do what [C]I have [E]done
Spend your [Am]lives in [C]sin and [D]misery [F]
In the [Am]House of [E]Rising [Am]Sun

musicStruct.verse1:
[Em7]Today is [G]gonna be the day that they're [D]gonna throw it back to [C]you
[Em7]By now you [G]should've somehow real[D]ized what you gotta [C]do
[Em7]I don't believe that [G]anybody [D]feels the way I [C]do about you [D]now
musicStruct.verse2:
[Em7]Backbeat the [G]word is on the street that [D]fire in your heart is [C]out
[Em7]I'm sure you've [G]heard it all before but you [D]never really had a [C]doubt
[Em7]I don't believe that [G]anybody [D]feels the way I [C]do about you [D]now
musicStruct.chorus:
And [C]all the roads we [D]have to walk are [Em7]winding
And [C]all the lights that [D]lead us there are [Em7]blinding
[C]There are many [D]things that I would [G]like to say to [Em7]you
But I don't know [A]how
Because [C]maybe [Em7]
You're [G]gonna be the one that [D]saves me
And [C]after [Em7]all
You're my [G]wonder[D]wall

musicStruct.verse1:
[F]Olha que coisa mais [G7]linda, mais [Gm7]cheia de [C7]graça
[F]É ela menina que [G7]vem e que [Gm7]passa [C7]
[F]Num doce [F#dim]balanço a ca[Gm7]minho do [C7]mar
musicStruct.verse2:
[F]Moça do corpo dou[G7]rado do [Gm7]sol de Ipa[C7]nema
[F]O seu balançado é [G7]mais que um [Gm7]poema [C7]
[F]É a coisa mais [F#dim]linda que [Gm7]eu já vi pas[C7]sar
musicStruct.bridge:
[Gb7]Ah, por que estou tão so[F]zinho?
[Gb7]Ah, por que tudo é tão [F]triste?
[Gb7]Ah, a beleza que e[Am7]xiste
A be[D7]leza que [Gm7]não é só [C7]minha
Que também [F]passa sozi[C7]nha

musicStruct.verse1:
Now I've [C]heard there was a [Am]secret chord
That [C]David played, and it [Am]pleased the Lord
But [F]you don't really [G]care for music, [C]do you? [G]
It [C]goes like this, the [F]fourth, the [G]fifth
The [Am]minor fall, the [F]major lift
The [G]baffled king com[E7]posing Halle[Am]lujah
musicStruct.verse2:
Your [C]faith was strong but you [Am]needed proof
You [C]saw her bathing [Am]on the roof
Her [F]beauty and the [G]moonlight over[C]threw you [G]
She [C]tied you to a [F]kitchen [G]chair
She [Am]broke your throne, and she [F]cut your hair
And [G]from your lips she [E7]drew the Halle[Am]lujah
